Html:
Hi All,

Is there any way to hide the particular module in the Loading time of Bootstrapper class. Please provide me the valuable solution.

Thanks and regard,

Sakthi

Hi,

Based on my understanding of your scenario, you might benefit from loading modules on demand. You can find more information about this in the following chapter of the Prism documentation at MSDN:

  • Loading Modules on Demand

If this is not the scenario you are looking for, it would be helpful if you could provide us with a little more information about it, so that we can help you further with this.

Thanks,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
